# removeFirst()

**Instance Method**

Removes and returns the first element of the collection.

## Declaration

```swift
@discardableResult mutating func removeFirst() -> Self.Element
```

## Return Value

The first element of the collection.

## Discussion

The collection must not be empty.



## Selecting and Excluding Elements

- **popFirst()**: Removes and returns the first element of the collection.
- **removeFirst(_:)**: Removes the specified number of elements from the beginning of the collection.
